DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis of this study that the Point-Of-Care Chemistry Test (POCT) may shorten Emergency Department (ED) length of stay (LOS).
DOC.brief_title: Can the Point-Of-Care Chemistry Test (POCT) Solve the Emergency Department (ED) Crowding?
DOC.detailed_description: ED crowding is one of the most serious problems in ED. POCT has shorter turn-around time compared to centralized laboratory system. If POCT introduce to ED, it may help to shorten LOS of ED patients.
DOC.criteria: Patients older than 15 years clinically required to have chemistry lab tests ESI 25 written agreement to participate no agreement ESI level 1 no chemistry lab
